```{r}
pure_function <- function(x, y) {
    return(x + y)
}

impure_function <- function(x, y) {
    print(x)
    return(x + y)
}

pure_function(1, 2)
impure_function(1, 2)
```

```{r}
add <- function(x, y) {
    return(x + y)
}

subtract <- function(x, y) {
    return(x - y)
}

operate <- function(func, x, y) {
    return(func(x, y))
}

operate(add, 5, 3)
operate(subtract, 5, 3)
```

```{r}
add <- function(x, y) {
    return(x + y)
}

subtract <- function(x, y) {
    return(x - y)
}

create_operator <- function(op) {
    if (op == "add") {
        return(add)
    } else if (op == "subtract") {
        return(subtract)
    }
}

operator <- create_operator("add")
operator(5, 3)
```

```{r}
numeric_vector <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
character_vector <- c("a", "b", "c", "d", "e")
logical_vector <- c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)

matrix_1 <- matrix(1:9, nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
matrix_2 <- matrix(letters[1:9], nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
matrix_3 <- matrix(c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE), nrow = 2, ncol = 3)

data_frame <- data.frame(
    name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"),
    age = c(25, 30, 35),
    married = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)
)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("data_frame.csv")
head(data)
# write.csv(data, "data_frame.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
data <- data.frame(
    name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"),
    age = c(25, 30, 35),
    married = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)
)

# Filter data
filtered_data <- data[data$age > 30, ]

# Sort data
sorted_data <- data[order(data$age), ]

# Aggregate data
aggregated_data <- aggregate(data$age, by = list(data$married), FUN = mean)
```

```{r}
data_1 <- data.frame(
    name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"),
    age = c(25, 30, 35),
    married = c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)
)

data_2 <- data.frame(
    name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"),
    salary = c(50000, 60000, 70000)
)

merged_data <- merge(data_1, data_2, by = "name")
joined_data <- merge(data_1, data_2, by = "name", all = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

data <- data.frame(
    x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
    y = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
)

ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_point()
```

```{r}
library(plotly)

data <- data.frame(
    x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
    y = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
)

plot_ly(data, x = ~x, y = ~y, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)

data <- data.frame(
    x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
    y = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
)

data %>%
    filter(x > 2) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_point()
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)

data <- tibble(
    x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
    y = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10)
)

data %>%
    filter(x > 2) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
    geom_point()
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)

data <- data.frame(
    x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
    y = c(2, 4, 6, 8, 10),
    group = c("A", "A", "B", "B", "B")
)

data %>%
    group_by(group) %>%
    summarize(mean_y = mean(y))
```
